name: Bonkaheck Ballin: Inquiry of Absolution
description:
From the ground-up remake of 'Bonkaheck Ballin', the first game I ever made, released in 2021. Now beatable and with a speed-run mode, trudge through 3 levels while jamming out to neat lil' songs. 

Soundtrack by Logan Mitchell and Sean Tarantella!

Art by Joey Arminio!

Design, programming , and 3D models by Jake Stevenson!
